remarks: The value of the ` Z/nZ ` structure.  It is defined as the quotient ring ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , with an "artificial" ordering added to make it a ` Toset ` .  (In other words, ` Z/nZ ` is a _ring_ with an _order_ , but it is not an _ordered ring_ , which as a term implies that the order is compatible with the ring operations in some way.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
znval.s $e |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) $.
znval.u $e |- U = ( ZZring /s ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) $.
zncrng2 $p |- ( N e. ZZ -> U e. CRing ) $.
